com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice
Class PollingObject

java.lang.Object
  com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice.PollingObject

public class PollingObject
extends java.lang.Object

This object represents a set of polling definitions and corresponding devices that they apply to.

public PollingObject(java.util.ArrayList<PollingDefinition> polls,

Creates a polling object used to define a set of poll that can be run on a set of devices

Parameters:
polls - - ArrrayList of SNMP polls
devices - - ArrayList of devices that can run polls

split

public java.util.ArrayList<PollingObject> split()
Splits current object in half by dividing stored devices into two new PollingObjects. If number of devices is an odd number, the first PollingObject in the ArrayList will have one more device than the other.

Returns:
- An ArrayList containing two PollingObjects
